line.comment: * Wait to be sure that the game knows where we are and that the galaxy is initialized.
* First Run (not import - it's impossible to export a game from Argon Prime, see Menu.PC)
* Note: E/I imports its own 'mayhemVersion' in order to do maintenance after an E/I if needed.
* So player can repair their ships early game using a marine
* Give money to the shipyard if we are in Quickstart.
* Creates the two ships the player is supposed to capture along the way, in Normal mode.
* At this point, the sector can be Unknown because of the random unknown sectors feature.
* Unlocks shipyards information and data market
* Could be already created by setup.Mayhem.
* Make sure pirate stations are pirates.
* Random Unknown sectors. We first assign cluster start points.
* set discovered status: type={Argon Drone Production Facility L} status=[TRUE]
* Remove QJE and MK3, and jumpdrive if needed

sval.val: Wait to be sure that the game knows where we are and that the galaxy is initialized.
First Run (not import - it's impossible to export a game from Argon Prime, see Menu.PC)
Note: E/I imports its own 'mayhemVersion' in order to do maintenance after an E/I if needed.
So player can repair their ships early game using a marine
Give money to the shipyard if we are in Quickstart.
Creates the two ships the player is supposed to capture along the way, in Normal mode.
At this point, the sector can be Unknown because of the random unknown sectors feature.
Unlocks shipyards information and data market
Could be already created by setup.Mayhem.
Make sure pirate stations are pirates.
Random Unknown sectors. We first assign cluster start points.
set discovered status: type={Argon Drone Production Facility L} status=[TRUE]
Remove QJE and MK3, and jumpdrive if needed
